name: places/ChIJVzrUw-1YwokRI4MHtJp3PVI
adrFormatAddress: 853 5th Ave, New York, NY 10065-5897, USA

originalText.text: I cannot praise this wonderful doctor high enough. I was given a facelift 27 years ago. It has held up so much that I am perceived 25 to 30 years younger. Being a doctor myself I am very critical. He is without a doubt the only doctor I would ever let touch my face. His skill is matched only by his gentle manner and caring. I am beyond grateful that a very satisfied patient introduced him to me. Not only is he extremely skilled but he refused to do unnecessary procedures which I respected so much. More doctors should be like him.

originalText.text: MUTILATED AND BOTCHED!!! I can’t even look into the mirror without being terrified. Anyone who is giving this doctor 5 stars is a LIAR. I had a breast lift with implants leaving my chest looking like I got hit with about 200 bullets. My scars are so brutal that all I can wear is about a high neck shirt. I also had a rhinoplasty in which I can now not breathe not to mention he operated on my nose TWICE. This man should be stripped of all licenses and be ashamed to call himself a medical professional. Not to mention he is RUDE and his staff is INCOMPETENT! Botched isn’t even the word for a young girl I will now have to seek ways to fix the mess that this man made of my body.

originalText.text:
Dr. Romita is a very experienced surgeon with the best staff. They're welcoming and do excellent work. I've had two procedures with Dr. Romita and I had the best results. He discussed the steps, what he would be doing, and the recuperation times. He was very honest which I appreciated so I would not be disappointed with my results. Most importantly, he's available post-op for you.

I'm so happy and comfortable with my changes. I'm so thrilled that I've recommended his services to a few friends and they've gone to him already.

originalText.text:
My experience with Dr. Romita has been excellent! He is highly skilled as a surgeon and as a person,  Very good bedside manners. I am thrilled with the outcome of my surgery,  I am feeling great and  results were great!! Thank you Dr. Romita!!!

I would Also  like to say that all of his staff is excellent! always guiding and answering all sorts of questions. You are all awesome! Thanks so much!!!

Dr. Romita it's a great professional, kind and lovely human and surgeon. I am very happy to choose and Doctor with the experience that he have. All his staff are also professional and very passionate. They make me feel so good and confidence during each appointment also thru my recovering.
God bless you Dr. Romita
